title: iDesign Linus Turntable, Clear
features: KITCHEN TURNTABLE ORGANIZER: Provides efficient rotating storage for kitchen and pantry items in cabinets, on shelves, or in the refrigerator
OPEN DESIGN WITH RAISED EDGES: Open design keeps items visible and easily accessible, while raised edges prevent them from falling out while turning the organizer
VERSATILE USES: Can also be used in the bathroom, bedroom, office, or anywhere that you need additional organization
MADE WITH BPA-FREE PLASTIC: Durable BPA-free plastic construction stands up to every day use and is easy to clean with mild soap and water
EFFICIENT SIZE: Measures 11.25" x 11.25" x 1.75" and is ideal for adding storage in compact spaces
description: Keep kitchen essentials organized and in reach with the iDesign Linus 11.25" Rotating Turntable Organizer. This turntable provides efficient rotating storage for kitchen and pantry items in cabinets, on shelves, or in the refrigerator. The open design ensures that items are always visible and easily accessible, while the raised edges prevent them from falling out while turning the organizer. This versatile spinning organizer can also be used in the bathroom, bedroom, office, laundry room, or in any room around the home that you need additional organization. The modern transparent design with blue-colored accent complements a variety of decor styles, and the durable BPA-free plastic construction stands up to every day use and is easy to clean. Measuring 11.25" x 11.25" x 1.75", this rotating turntable is ideal for maximizing storage in compact spaces. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
